title: JEWISH APPLE CAKE
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an angel food or bundt pan.
Peel, core and chop apples into chunks. Toss with cinnamon and sugar and set aside.
Stir together flour, baking powder and salt in a large mixing bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk together oil, orange juice, sugar and vanilla.
Mix wet ingredients into the dry ones, then add eggs, one at a time, scraping down the bowl to ensure all ingredients are incorporated.

Pour half of batter into prepared pan. Spread half of apples over batter. Pour remaining batter over the apples and arrange remaining apples on top. Bake for about 1 hour, or until a tester comes out clean.
Cool on rack and then plate up. Serve with whipped cream and confectioners sugar dusted on top. Better the second day after being wrapped well.
ingredients: 2 cups white sugar, plus 6 tablespoons for tossing
